name: Hunting The Hunter (itch)
description:
One of the major reasons for the animals to go extinct is hunting. The player starts the adventure where he is pissed of by hunters and as for his wish to save animals, he starts killing hunters.

But he is not so good at dealing with weapons so the bullet recoil throws him away from the place he is standing, which is the core feature of our game.

Score

Killing Hunter Scores - 200

Capturing Hunter Score - 500

For the Controls, we have a special movement that makes the game fun and hard.

We use A and D to control the left and right movement.

The left Mouse Button: Can shoot the bullet, and the recoil can make the player jump.

The Right Mouse Button: To activate jetpack which can make players jump higher.

Weapon Upgrade System 

The player can Upgrade Damage Effect and Jump force by using the score stars that the player wins after killing or capturing Hunter

Let's See If You Can Save All Animals!
